means: 重述，改说( reword的现在分词 )

list.abs: CONCLUSION-Restate or reword your thesis . summarize your arguments . explain why you have come to this particular conclusion .“结论”——重申或重复你的论题。总结你的论点，距离为什么你已经得出了详细的结论。
reword that slightly , and you have the battle cry of half the men I dated .稻谷吸附与解吸等温线研究
百度词典搜索_重 ... a handsome reward;substantial reword; 重赏 revisit England; 重访英国.

if you type in cross-references to other parts of the document , those references can easily get out of date if you reword a heading , add or remove figures , or reorganize topics .如果你在文档中交叉引用了其他部分的内容，而当你修改标题、添加或删除图形、或者重新组织主题时，这些引用很可能就失效了。

entry.def: When you reword something that is spoken or written, you try to express it in a way that is more accurate, more acceptable, or more easily understood.

example.ex: All right, I'll reword my question...
example.tran: 好的，我会换个说法来问。
在1986年这些规则进行了修改。

means.word_mean: 1. changing a particular word or phrase

auth_sentence.content: - This is the Hume rewording, so what is that other sentence?
auth_sentence.res_content: - This is the Hume rewording, so what is that other sentence?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: - This is the Hume rewording, so what is that other sentence?
